game_description: Guardians Frontline is a Sci-Fi VR shooter where you wield powerful weapons and command robot armies that help you fight off enemies in single-player, co-op, and PvP game modes. A UNIQUE SCI-FI SHOOTER Guardians Frontline blends the action-packed gameplay of FPS shooters with elements from real-time strategy games, allowing players to shoot a wide variety of weapons but also spawn structures & units. Kill an enemy with your machine gun while you simultaneously drop a 5 Ton Mech straight to the battlefield! A RANGE OF WEAPONS & VEHICLES Brought in to protect the federation, as a Guardian you have access to a huge range of weaponry and tools. Shoot the Gravity Gun to smash your enemies against the cliffs, and maneuver both mechs and spaceships to wreak havoc from the ground as well as the sky! GUARDIAN FRIENDS‚Ä¶ AND FOES The single player experience lets you protect the federation while they extract a new and mysterious energy source. In addition, the Guardians Frontline campaign and its missions can be played with up to 4 players in co-operative mode while up to 8 players can battle it out in tense and strategic PvP fights. A FLOOD OF USER GENERATED CONTENT Guardians Frontline has a comprehensive but easy-to-use in-game level editor that allows anyone to build their own maps and make them public for the community to enjoy, leading to almost infinite replay value.
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Chinese (China), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
review_1: Well read the reviews so though I'd give it a go, if it's been hyped up then get a refund. Well I've just taken a break after almost 4 hours of playing ü§£ü§£ü§£, not that I recommend buying a battery pack so you can play this game that long, but hell yea this is the game I've been waiting for.... This game is absolutely awesome, I'm 47 and I felt like John Spartan from halo, shouting at my kids to get out of the room and kicking the dog while on a killing spree. The developers have created a game which is already amazing, and you can see there's still things being developed which is so exciting. THIS GAME WILL GIVE YOU MORE EXCITEMENT THAN YOUR WIFE DOES The new game slogan right there ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£üëçüèª After a few months of playing I can absolutely say this is now the only game I play, it is massively addictive and I'm now at master level üòÇ. The only downside is and would be awesome if they could add a feature where you can friend anyone you've played with online, nothing worse than finding a team you gel with and can't meet up for another mission at a later date, unfortunately it doesn't come up on the recently seen on the quest so you just have to hope you bump into them again. This is just an idea as be awesome if you could create your own dream team of players to a platoon to future sessions. Otherwise I'd give it 10 stars out of 5 haha

review_3: A really fun strategic game. Multiplayer makes it even better. Positive: - Graphics are pretty good - Challanging - Good leveling system Negative: - No Crossbuy - Weapon handling could be better (hopefully it will be improved over time by the developer) - Still many bugs included (Some of them, I experienced: falling through the map, weapon does not shoot immediately, not being able to push the button to finish the game) Conclusion: It is a fun and immersive Game. I would recommend to buy it. The challenges are endless, The graphics are incredible, and in this game, I actually have legs! If you look at the games, I have already purchased, you‚Äôll see my flavor of play. review_5: When I was little my folks got me to watch all of Starship Troopers and I love all the movies and when my friend showed me this game I fell in love with it on first glance cuz it reminded me of Starship Troopers plus it has a tower defence mechanic to it that I love. Thank you that made this and hopefully maybe make another enemy that looks like the bugs from the movie.
